snippet.title: A Better Tomorrow - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Join the green revolution! 🌱 Relax and learn about clean energy in this cozy, minimalist 2D city-building strategy game. Build windmills, solar panels, and more to provide energy to villages and cities while protecting the environment. Let's work together to make 'A Better Tomorrow'!

A Better Tomorrow is a minimalist 2D city-building environmental game that focuses on green energy. Your goal is to supply clean energy to your citizens while preserving the environment for an in-game week. Build green energy generators and plant trees to achieve this. Immerse yourself in this cozy and relaxing experience and learn about green energy.

This videogame was developed as my thesis for a Bachelor's Degree in Video Game Design and Development. A Better Tomorrow is a game that aims to spread relevant information about green energy with simple yet engaging gameplay. Through its gameplay, the game seeks to inform the player about the various types of clean energy recognized by the EU Commission, the infrastructure needed to transform each energy into electricity, and the pros and cons of each energy.

Trailer edited by @mikelrid
